column4: i need help setting up my adsl modem the modem is show in the hardware info. but how do i get it to connect to the inter net
what type of adsl modem do you have?
USB adsl modem conexant e-tech v2
r u there? i have a USB adsl modem conexant e-tech v2
I am just looking it up.
have you located the firmware for the modem?
yes
i did all that coppying the bin file to the firmware folder
but i dont know what to do next
does your provider use PPPoE or PPPoATM?
PPPoE
I followed this post up to the part where u copy the bin file to the firm ware folder. after that  when i run dmesg | tail i get this error new full speed USB device using uhci_hcd and address 3
i looked at that before.
I tried this also http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=194237
have you run 'sudo pppoeconf'
yes. it said no network inface detected or somthing like that
no more. ideas. what shuld i do next?. plz dont tell me to get new modem
just reading mate.
have you checked your system log to see if the modem is installed correctly?
i it dmesg | tail
less /var/log/syslog
dmesg |grep cxacru
